answers.answer: Hello,Frequent urge and passing or urine especially  at night is called nocturia. Causes are sleep apnea, hyperparathyroidism, chronic renal failure, urinary incontinence, bladder infection, Interstitial Cystitis, diabetes, heart failure and benign prostatic hyperplasia.You need to consult a urologist and get your blood sugar levels, urine examination, urine culture, PSA, prostate examination and kidney function tests done. All these possibilities also need to be ruled out one by one. I sincerely hope that helps. Take care and regards.

question: I constantly feel like I have to pee but only at night. This has been happening to me on occasion for about a year but lately its been so bad that i feel sleep deprived. I do not have any burning sensation when I go. I go normal during the day. I don't understand this. I have been told it all in my head. Help!
title: I feel like i constantly have to pee, but only at night
